<a id="class_MeshLibrary"></a>

# MeshLibrary

**Inherits:** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

Library of meshes.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A library of meshes. Contains a list of [Mesh](class_mesh.md) resources, each with a name and ID. Each item can also include collision and navigation shapes. This resource is used in [GridMap](class_gridmap.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [3D Kinematic Character Demo](https://godotengine.org/asset-library/asset/2739)

- [3D Platformer Demo](https://godotengine.org/asset-library/asset/2748)

## Method Descriptions

<a id="class_MeshLibrary_method_clear"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **clear**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_MeshLibrary_method_clear)

Clears the library.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_MeshLibrary_method_create_item"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **create_item**\ (\ id\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_MeshLibrary_method_create_item)

Creates a new item in the library with the given ID.

You can get an unused ID from [get_last_unused_item_id()](class_meshlibrary.md#class_MeshLibrary_method_get_last_unused_item_id).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_MeshLibrary_method_find_item_by_name"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](class_int.md) **find_item_by_name**\ (\ name\: [String](class_string.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_MeshLibrary_method_find_item_by_name)

Returns the first item with the given name, or ``-1`` if no item is found.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_MeshLibrary_method_get_item_list"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PackedInt32Array](class_packedint32array.md) **get_item_list**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_MeshLibrary_method_get_item_list)

Returns the list of item IDs in use.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_MeshLibrary_method_get_item_mesh"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

Returns the item's mesh.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_MeshLibrary_method_get_item_mesh_cast_shadow"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[ShadowCastingSetting](class_renderingserver.md#enum_RenderingServer_ShadowCastingSetting) **get_item_mesh_cast_shadow**\ (\ id\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_MeshLibrary_method_get_item_mesh_cast_shadow)

<!-- classref-method -->

Returns the transform applied to the item's mesh.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](class_int.md) **get_item_navigation_layers**\ (\ id\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_MeshLibrary_method_get_item_navigation_layers)

Returns the item's navigation layers bitmask.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_MeshLibrary_method_get_item_navigation_mesh"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[NavigationMesh](class_navigationmesh.md) **get_item_navigation_mesh**\ (\ id\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_MeshLibrary_method_get_item_navigation_mesh)

Returns the item's navigation mesh.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_MeshLibrary_method_get_item_navigation_mesh_transform"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Transform3D](class_transform3d.md) **get_item_navigation_mesh_transform**\ (\ id\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_MeshLibrary_method_get_item_navigation_mesh_transform)

Returns the transform applied to the item's navigation mesh.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_MeshLibrary_method_get_item_preview"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Texture2D](class_texture2d.md) **get_item_preview**\ (\ id\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_MeshLibrary_method_get_item_preview)

When running in the editor, returns a generated item preview (a 3D rendering in isometric perspective). When used in a running project, returns the manually-defined item preview which can be set using [set_item_preview()](class_meshlibrary.md#class_MeshLibrary_method_set_item_preview). Returns an empty [Texture2D](class_texture2d.md) if no preview was manually set in a running project.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_MeshLibrary_method_get_item_shapes"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Array](class_array.md) **get_item_shapes**\ (\ id\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_MeshLibrary_method_get_item_shapes)

Returns an item's collision shapes.

The array consists of each [Shape3D](class_shape3d.md) followed by its [Transform3D](class_transform3d.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_MeshLibrary_method_get_last_unused_item_id"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](class_int.md) **get_last_unused_item_id**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_MeshLibrary_method_get_last_unused_item_id)

Gets an unused ID for a new item.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **remove_item**\ (\ id\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_MeshLibrary_method_remove_item)

Removes the item.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_MeshLibrary_method_set_item_mesh"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_item_mesh**\ (\ id\: [int](class_int.md), mesh\: [Mesh](class_mesh.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_MeshLibrary_method_set_item_mesh)

Sets the item's mesh.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_MeshLibrary_method_set_item_mesh_cast_shadow"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_item_mesh_cast_shadow**\ (\ id\: [int](class_int.md), shadow_casting_setting\: [ShadowCastingSetting](class_renderingserver.md#enum_RenderingServer_ShadowCastingSetting)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_MeshLibrary_method_set_item_mesh_cast_shadow)

Sets the item's shadow casting mode to `shadow_casting_setting`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_MeshLibrary_method_set_item_mesh_transform"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_item_mesh_transform**\ (\ id\: [int](class_int.md), mesh_transform\: [Transform3D](class_transform3d.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_MeshLibrary_method_set_item_mesh_transform)

Sets the transform to apply to the item's mesh.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_MeshLibrary_method_set_item_name"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_item_name**\ (\ id\: [int](class_int.md), name\: [String](class_string.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_MeshLibrary_method_set_item_name)

Sets the item's name.

This name is shown in the editor. It can also be used to look up the item later using [find_item_by_name()](class_meshlibrary.md#class_MeshLibrary_method_find_item_by_name).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_MeshLibrary_method_set_item_navigation_layers"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_item_navigation_layers**\ (\ id\: [int](class_int.md), navigation_layers\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_MeshLibrary_method_set_item_navigation_layers)

Sets the item's navigation layers bitmask.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_MeshLibrary_method_set_item_navigation_mesh"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_item_navigation_mesh**\ (\ id\: [int](class_int.md), navigation_mesh\: [NavigationMesh](class_navigationmesh.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_MeshLibrary_method_set_item_navigation_mesh)

Sets the item's navigation mesh.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_MeshLibrary_method_set_item_navigation_mesh_transform"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_item_navigation_mesh_transform**\ (\ id\: [int](class_int.md), navigation_mesh\: [Transform3D](class_transform3d.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_MeshLibrary_method_set_item_navigation_mesh_transform)

Sets the transform to apply to the item's navigation mesh.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_MeshLibrary_method_set_item_preview"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_item_preview**\ (\ id\: [int](class_int.md), texture\: [Texture2D](class_texture2d.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_MeshLibrary_method_set_item_preview)

Sets a texture to use as the item's preview icon in the editor.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_MeshLibrary_method_set_item_shapes"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_item_shapes**\ (\ id\: [int](class_int.md), shapes\: [Array](class_array.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_MeshLibrary_method_set_item_shapes)

Sets an item's collision shapes.

The array should consist of [Shape3D](class_shape3d.md) objects, each followed by a [Transform3D](class_transform3d.md) that will be applied to it. For shapes that should not have a transform, use [Transform3D.IDENTITY](class_transform3d.md#class_Transform3D_constant_IDENTITY).
